entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He is described as attempting to flatten his hair and feeling resentful towards Fleur's family.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another main character in the story. He is described as stumping back upstairs to put on matching socks.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a main character in the story. She is mentioned alongside Harry and Ron as being deemed smart enough.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a main character in the story. She is mentioned alongside Harry, Ron, and Hermione as feeling resentful towards Fleur's family.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is a person whose family Harry, Ron, Hermione, and Ginny are feeling resentful towards.

entities.name: flutterby bushes
entities.description: The Flutterby bushes are new additions to the backyard. They are described as standing either side of the door in large pots.

relationships.description: Harry feels resentful towards Fleur's family, along with Ron, Hermione, and Ginny.
Ron is putting on matching socks.
